mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT price FROM consignment WHERE target_id = #{targetId} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS newset, ( SELECT price FROM consignment WHERE target_id = #{targetId} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS hight, ( SELECT price FROM consignment WHERE target_id = #{targetId} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS low

SELECT a.id as consignmentId, a.bp_id, a.target_id, a.quantity, a.price, a.type, b.title, b.cover, a.created, a.updated FROM `consignment` a LEFT JOIN v_bp b on a.bp_id = b.id WHERE a.target_id = #{targetId} and a.`status` = 1 and a.type = #{type}

SELECT DISTINCT a.target_id, a.type, c.title, c.cover, ( SELECT price FROM consignment WHERE target_id = b.target_id AND type = b.type AND `status` = 3 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS newset, ( SELECT max( price ) FROM consignment WHERE target_id = b.target_id AND type = b.type ) AS hight, ( SELECT min( price ) FROM consignment WHERE target_id = b.target_id AND type = b.type ) AS low FROM consignment a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT target_id, type FROM consignment ) b ON b.target_id = a.target_id AND b.type = a.type LEFT JOIN item_sku c ON c.id = a.target_id WHERE a.`status` = 1
